Type.Description: User is disable in on-prem AD
Type.Solution: Enable the user in on-prem AD and try again

Type.description: User is NOT ready for Teams direct routing
Type.Solution: Enable the user in on-prem AD, then sync to AAD - You may need to remove old SFB attribtues in AD staring with msRTCSIP-*

Type.Description: User is ready for Teams direct routing
User is NOT ready for Teams direct routing
Type.Solution: Assign a Teams licens to the user (E3 or E5 fx.)

Type.description: User is NOT ready for Teams direct routing
Type.Solution: Enable the user in on-prem AD

Type.description: User is NOT ready for Teams direct routing
Type.Solution: Enable the user in on-prem AD and Assign a Teams licens to the user (E3 or E5 fx.)

Type.description: User is NOT ready for Teams direct routing
Type.Solution: Not clear - Do a Get-csonlineuser and investigate

Type.description: User is NOT ready for Teams direct routing
Type.Solution: Enable the user in on-prem AD and try again

Type.description: User is NOT ready for Teams direct routing
Type.Solution: This is an Teams applications - Dont proceed

Type.description: User is NOT ready for Teams direct routing
Type.Solution: This is a deleted application - Chose another user

Type.description: User is ready for Teams direct routing
User is NOT ready for Teams direct routing
Type.Solution: User needs a licens - Assign a Teams licens to the user (E3 or E5 fx.)

Type.description: User is NOT ready for Teams direct routing
Type.Solution: User needs a licens and is a process of being deleted - If licens is assigned, the user could be ready for Teams direct routing

Type.description: User is NOT ready for Teams direct routing
Type.Solution: User might be deleted in AAD - Enable user in AD and sync the user to AAD

Type.description: User is NOT ready for Teams direct routing
Type.Solution: User might be deleted in AAD - Enable user in AD and sync the user to AAD and then Assign a Teams licens to the user (E3 or E5 fx.)

Type.description: User is NOT ready for Teams direct routing
Type.Solution: User might be deleted in AAD - Enable user in AD and sync the user to AAD

Type.description: User is NOT ready for Teams direct routing
Type.Solution: Enable user in AD and sync the user to AAD
